name: Block Star King
description:
Block Star King can enjoy it everywhere, every time without need online. This offline one has game play very simple: just drag, drop and fill up all the grid. But once playing, you can’t be stopped attracted by this classic brick game. It's really addictive

Highlight:
- Simple play and easy control
- Different game modes for challengers
- Smoothly, no crash, no harmful battery
- Attracted sound effects
